Comment.value:
Remove wedding ring from PC

Set local NW_G_M3Q00TALKFOLLOWPC to 1
Set NW_G_M3Q02PLOTBRETSFAMILYSAFE to 1, escape area, respawn here in Fort Ilkard Barracks beside her husband

Lock on and follow PC until player reaches trigger at 3QC201 (East Road).  At that point Set local NW_G_M3Q00TALKFOLLOWPC to 2, then init dialog again.

***

NOTE THAT SETTING NW_G_M3Q00TALKFOLLOWPC to 2 on the dialog node is a temporary script for testing purposes.  This script will have to be removed from the dialog node and set so that it will only fire when the trigger is crossed.
appears if player has wedding ring, take ring away from player and give to wife.
appears if player has wedding ring, take ring away from player and give to wife.
